metadata.feature_description: Search wiki articles and display filtered lists with pagination

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki module list view
steps.expected: Wiki page loads with article list
steps.actual: Wiki page loaded with 17 articles displayed

steps.action: Type 'XSS' in the search box and click Search articles
steps.actual: Search returned 2 results: 'XSS Sanitization Test Article' and 'Article with Special Chars'

steps.action: Click on 'markdown-test' tag in the Tags sidebar
steps.expected: Article list filters to show only articles with the selected tag
steps.actual: List filtered to show 2 articles tagged with 'markdown-test'

steps.action: Searched for article type filter UI element
steps.expected: Article type filter dropdown or selection available
steps.actual: Code supports article type filtering via SearchOptions but no UI element exposed in desktop view. Article types are available in the system (ArticleController.GetAvailableTypes method exists).

issues: Article type filter not exposed in desktop UI, only available programmatically

steps.expected: Article list filters to show only articles created by current user
steps.actual: List filtered to show 17 articles created by SuperUser Account

steps.action: Searched for Draft articles filter in desktop view
steps.expected: Draft articles filter available for moderators
steps.actual: Code review confirms 'draftonly' filter exists but is only available in mobile view dropdown (ListContainer.ascx line 183). Desktop view only shows 'All Articles' and 'My Articles' tabs.

issues: Draft articles filter only available in mobile view, not desktop view

steps.action: Click on page 2 in the pagination controls
steps.actual: Page 2 loaded with different articles (Test Article - Title Updated, Test Draft Article, etc.)
Articles sorted alphabetically: Activity Journal Test Article, Article with Special Chars, Case Sensitivity Test Article, etc.
Articles reordered with 'XSS Sanitization Test Article' first (most viewed)

steps.action: Type '<>&@#$' in search box and click Search articles
steps.expected: Search handles special characters gracefully without errors
steps.actual: Search executed successfully, special characters URL-encoded (%3C%3E for <>), displayed 'No results found' as expected
Search returned 'No results found.' message with search term and Wiki scope filter shown

observations: Filter by article type: Code in ArticleController.cs supports article type filtering via GetAvailableTypes method, but no UI element is exposed in the desktop view to allow users to filter by article type.
View Draft articles: The 'draftonly' category filter is only available in the mobile view dropdown (ListContainer.ascx line 181-184). Desktop view only exposes 'All Articles' and 'My Articles' tabs.
Sort options include: 'Sort by last active', 'Sort by created', 'Sort by title', and 'Sort by views' - all functioning correctly.
Tag filtering works both via sidebar tag cloud and inline tag links on articles.
Pagination shows 'Page X of Y' format with numbered page links and prev/next arrows.
